description: Enterprise techniques used by NDiskMonitor, ATT&CK software S0272 v1.1
name: NDiskMonitor (S0272)

techniques.comment: [NDiskMonitor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0272) uses AES to encrypt certain information sent over its C2 channel.(Citation: TrendMicro Patchwork Dec 2017)
[NDiskMonitor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0272) can obtain a list of all files and directories as well as logical drives.(Citation: TrendMicro Patchwork Dec 2017)
[NDiskMonitor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0272) can download and execute a file from given URL.(Citation: TrendMicro Patchwork Dec 2017)
[NDiskMonitor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0272) obtains the victim computer name and encrypts the information to send over its C2 channel.(Citation: TrendMicro Patchwork Dec 2017)
[NDiskMonitor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0272) obtains the victim username and encrypts the information to send over its C2 channel.(Citation: TrendMicro Patchwork Dec 2017)
